name: Juan_Rodriguez_Cabrillo
text:
Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo
Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo was the first European to reach the northwest coast of what would later become the United States.
In 1542, reportedly needing directions, Cabrillo reached what would become known as the Puget Sound.
Behind the scenes
Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo (1497 – January 3, 1543) was Spanish explorer who was the first European to navigate the coast of modern-day California.
